name: Fantasy & Ash
description:
Story

Set in the land of Kyntera, Andrel, a high-level member of a local adventurer’s guild is killed on a routine quest under suspicious circumstances. He awakens to find that they have been reborn as a level 1 adventurer, with only a note from the kingdom explaining his situation and a sword. He must work his way back to his previous position by completing quests and hunting monsters, all while trying to uncover what happened.

By fighting orc's and skeleton's Andrel and his party will atain experience aswell as gold in order to pay their way back into the kingdom.
